name: /invite extra white space before @ in DM or GM

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)
customFields.Cypress Reports: RELEASE - TM4J-Key-Mapped-In-Cypress-Release - TM4J key found Cypress release run report  (SDET/QA)

inline.description:
/invite - could also add tests for:
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. In a DM or GM use the /invite command to invite a user to a channel you have permission to add them to but place extra white space before the username
    (e.g., "/invite       @username)

customFields.Related ticket(s): Extra white space character will prevent slash commands from finding the user in the @mention — MM-10406
